meanings.sent1: The reinvasions of the ants into the picnic area caused chaos.
meanings.sent2: The reinvasions of enemy troops were relentless.
meanings.sent3: The reinvasions of the squirrels into the bird feeder became a daily comedy show.
meanings.sent4: The reinvasions of memories flooded her mind like a sudden storm.
meanings.sent5: The reinvasions of the weeds in the garden were like an unstoppable army.

meanings.definition: The repeated invasion of a place or territory.
meanings.sent1: The reinvasions of the enemy army were unexpected.
meanings.sent2: The reinvasions of the beach by tourists happened every summer.
meanings.sent3: The reinvasions of the cookie jar by the kids were always amusing.
meanings.sent4: The reinvasions of laughter filled the room like a joyful wave.
meanings.sent5: The reinvasions of the snow on the mountain were a breathtaking sight.
